inventory.commentary: Did not include WordNet sense 3, proper name (Johnny Cash)

sense.name: physical currency as bills or coins
sense.commentary: CASH[+entity][+physical][+currency] Note: refers to physical pieces of money, not the abstract exchange value
sense.examples: Three twenties and a ten is all the cash I have on me at the moment. This restaurant only accepts cash, no checks or credit cards. The cash in my pocket got soaked with rain!

sense.name: abstract relationship of exchange value
sense.commentary: CASH[+relation][+financial][+exchange][+value] Note: refers to the abstract exchange value, not paper money and coins
sense.examples: The business has been running a negative cash flow for six months. The photographs have no real cash value, they are only of sentimental value. The cash that flows electronically through the stock exchanges daily is worth trillions of dollars.
